sentences.en: He may apply for tax refund when overpayment is confirmed upon examination.
sentences.cn: 经审核后,确认多缴税款,可以办理退税.

sentences.en: Here is your overpayment and I'll give you another receipt.
sentences.cn: 这是您多付的钱,我重新给您一张发票.

sentences.en: Overpayment of a tax is refundable at the end of the year.
sentences.cn: 多付出的税金年底可以偿还.

sentences.en: The overpayment will be reimbursed to you.
sentences.cn: 多付的款项将退还给你.
